Docs.summary: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync.XpsSerializationCompleted"> event of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync>.

Docs.param: `true` to indicate that the serialization was canceled before completion; otherwise, `false`.
A user-supplied object that provides additional data to the event handler.
